readability_reflection: interpolation feit more readable . I liked seeing the variables more direct in side of the string. It was more clear as opposed to going back and forth between quotes and plus signs.
comprehension_debugging: interpolation is easier to debug. I didn't have to count spaces or worry about missing the plus at any point.
preference_rationale: im still going to go with interpolation for the future for the the sake that is cuts down on syntax and it doesn't have as many errors as concatenation.
learning_curve: concatenation always slows me down and im used to using the + for chaining so when is ee interpolation the examples just became easier for me to handle.
suggestions_improvement: offer consistent multiline syntax across languages and maybe also allow named placeholders to help readability
